pr_title: Add minItems validation to listeners array

timeline.message:
Add minItems validation to listeners array

Signed-off-by: Stanislav Knot <sknot@redhat.com>

timeline.bodyText: In hindsight documenting the annotations on the CrdGenerator class level Javadoc was a mistake. I know you've documented this there, but I think we should probably document the annotation here too. (In another PR we could move the documentation to each of the annotations we define, and only document the jackson annotations on the CrdGenerator class level Javadoc).
timeline.author: tombentley

replies.bodyText:
listeners: [] gives spec.kafka.listeners in the body should have at least 1 items
I am a little bit confused. Should I change doc in this PR or we will do some larger refactoring later?
replies.author: sknot-rh

replies.bodyText: Perfect! Another PR for the doc is fine.
replies.author: tombentley
